thread.title: Meet Blue: Founder of America’s Top Natural Pet Food Brand

author: Annie Gasparro
title: Meet Blue: Founder of America’s Top Natural Pet Food Brand
text:
The Bishop family says they aren’t really the founders of Blue Buffalo pet food—old Blue is.
Blue, the family dog who died when the brand was in its infancy, inspired his owners to create a more natural pet food with higher-quality ingredients when he faced several bouts of cancer at a young age, they said.
Bill and Jackie Bishop got Blue,...
